tool.name: OGS: ipDataToPointCloud
tool.description: Galaxy wrapper for the OGS utility 'ipDataToPointCloud'.
tool.command: if [ "$input_file" != "None" ] && [ ! -e '${$input_file.element_identifier}' ]; then ln -s '$input_file' '${$input_file.element_identifier}'; fi; ipDataToPointCloud --input-file '$input_file.element_identifier' --output-file output_1.vtu
tool.help: This tool runs the **ipDataToPointCloud** utility from the OpenGeoSys suite.
